law.catch_line: There is an Oil and Gas Fund....

text.section: There is an Oil and Gas Fund.

section.section: The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, unused money in the Fund may not revert to the General Fund.

text.section: The Fund shall be maintained and administered by the Department in accordance with the provisions of this subtitle and any regulations the Department adopts.
